name: GAO
description:
Surviving is one thing, evolving is another thing entirely. In fact, you cannot do it by yourself. Can you rise to the challenge of ensuring that LUCA’s descendants thrives? Or rather, the better question is how long can you sustain any given connection between LUCA and its farthest descendant? 

Our game challenges players to do just that; as the “intelligent designer” managing LUCA and its descendants, the player must decide which creatures he will combine to breed new generations. While creature traits exist, and may or may not grant advantages, the player can’t bank everything on traits to have genetically identical parents. 
If he does reach that point, this bloodline will end here and there. 
Limited by the physical space that limits movements and by action points, players will need to carefully manage the descendants if they want a sustainable population growth.
